We will try to gather information about our [meetups](http://www.meetup.com/Zurich-R-User-Group/) here.


----


### News

#### Data science [Lunchveranstaltung](http://t.uzh.ch/C)
There will a couple of talks about data science in the next few weeks at
UZH main building. Time is allways wednesdays 12.30 - 13.30. 

#### Our meetup will turn 1 
The Zurich R User Group was founded on November 18 2015 and
already we have more than 500 group members and organised 6 meetups.

#### Save the date for the ODD 2017
We will organize a hackathon for the next Open Data Day on the 4th of March.
Details will follow soon.
